titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to waive the payment of premiums for National Service Life Insurance by certain persons who have attained age seventy.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Waives the payment of premiums for National Service Life Insurance for veterans who have attained age 70 and have paid premiums on such insurance for not less than 25 years.
